entity.description: Fixed monthly fiscal calendar of an organization. A span of time during which the financial activities of an organization are calculated.

attributes.name: userfiscalcalendarid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user of the fiscal calendar.

attributes.name: salespersonid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the associated salesperson.

attributes.name: fiscalperiodtype
attributes.description: Type of fiscal period used in the fixed monthly fiscal calendar sales quota.

attributes.name: effectiveon
attributes.description: Date and time when the fixed monthly fiscal calendar sales quota takes effect.

attributes.name: period1
attributes.description: Sales quota for the first period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period2
attributes.description: Sales quota for the second period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period3
attributes.description: Sales quota for the third period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period4
attributes.description: Sales quota for the fourth period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period5
attributes.description: Sales quota for the fifth period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period6
attributes.description: Sales quota for the sixth period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period7
attributes.description: Sales quota for the seventh period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period8
attributes.description: Sales quota for the eighth period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period9
attributes.description: Sales quota for the ninth period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period10
attributes.description: Sales quota for the tenth period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period11
attributes.description: Sales quota for the eleventh period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period12
attributes.description: Sales quota for the twelfth period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period13
attributes.description: Sales quota for the thirteenth period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: createdby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the fiscal calendar.

attributes.name: createdon
attributes.description: Date and time when the quota for the fixed monthly fiscal calendar was created.

attributes.name: modifiedby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the fixed monthly fiscal calendar.

attributes.name: modifiedon
attributes.description: Date and time when the fixed monthly fiscal calendar was last modified.

attributes.name: businessunitid
attributes.description: Business unit responsible for the quota associated with this calendar.

attributes.name: timezoneruleversionnumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: exchangerate
attributes.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the fixed monthly fiscal calendar with respect to the base currency.

attributes.name: utcconversiontimezonecode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: transactioncurrencyid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the fixed monthly fiscal calendar.

attributes.name: period11_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the eleventh period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period9_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the ninth period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period12_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the twelfth period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period2_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the second period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period5_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the fifth period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period13_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the thirteenth period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period3_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the third period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period10_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the tenth period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period8_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the eighth period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period4_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the fourth period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period6_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the sixth period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period1_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the first period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: period7_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the seventh period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: createdonbehalfby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the fixedmonthlyfiscalcalendar.

attributes.name: modifiedonbehalfby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the fixedmonthlyfiscalcalendar.
